dict.acceptation: 包含，容纳；克制，遏制；牵制；包括或由…构成；

sent.orig: I have seen there are groups contain 3 students, others contain 4 students.
sent.trans: 我看到有3个人一组还有4个人一组的。

sent.orig: One jar will contain salt, and the other one will contain pepper!
sent.trans: 其中一个罐子里会是盐巴，另一个则是胡椒粉！

sent.orig: XSL-FO Block areas can contain other Block areas, but most often they contain Line areas.
sent.trans: fo块状区域包含其他的块状区域，但它们常包含行区域。

sent.orig: Standard soybeans contain about 7% linolenic acid whereas the new varieties contain 1% or 3%.
sent.trans: 普通大豆的亚麻酸含量约为7％，而这种新型大豆的亚麻酸含量仅为1％或3％。

sent.orig: Cysts in the lung usually contain air but occasionally contain fluid or solid material.
sent.trans: 肺囊肿内常含空气，但偶含液体或实体物质。
